article.title: Real-Time Coverage from TechNet Asia-Pacific
article.abstract: SIGNAL's real-time reporting will begin with the opening remarks by Gen. Vincent K. Brooks, USA, December 9, and will continue throughout the conference.
article.text: SIGNAL's real-time reporting will begin with the opening remarks by Gen. Vincent K. Brooks, USA, December 9, and will continue throughout the conference. Bookmark the event coverage site and check back frequently for new content.
